definitions: a container, oven, furnace, or apparatus for roasting something

examples.text: my mother used to cook poultry in an oval-lidded roaster

shortDefinitions: container, oven, furnace, or apparatus for roasting something

definitions: a person or company that processes coffee beans

examples.text: he set up his own business as a tea dealer and coffee roaster

shortDefinitions: person or company that processes coffee beans

definitions: a foodstuff that is particularly suitable for roasting, especially a chicken

examples.text: if you are using a roaster instead of a boiler, 45 to 50 minutes will cook it

shortDefinitions: foodstuff that is particularly suitable for roasting
